entities.name: winky
entities.description: Winky is described as keeping her master's secrets and being a good house-elf who keeps her silence.

entities.name: dobby
entities.description: Dobby is described as angrily defending Harry Potter and stating that he is brave and noble.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is mentioned as being accused of nosing into his master's private and secret matters.

relationships.description: Dobby defends Winky from Harry Potter.
Harry Potter is accused of nosing into Winky's master's private and secret matters.
